q: cynical amongst us should find it difficult to fault the logic. If Eric Schmidt is trying to paper over anything, could it be as simple as the fact that Page is 18 years younger? So for Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead, we could perhaps simply read, "Larry is old enough to take on this role as he approaches his 40s and I have had enough and would like a quieter life as I approach 60."

A story published Saturday said Daniels would be the odds-on favorite for the GOP nomination in 2012 if pundits, conservative columnists and political thinkers represented the party's base. The diminutive Hoosier has nurtured a profile as a mature politician whose outlook extends beyond the next news cycle and whose demeanor exudes seriousness, the story said. " The interview ended on an unexpected note when Piers Morgan asked Michael Oher if he felt that Philadelphia quarterback Michael Vick deserved a second chance. "People mess up all the time," Michael Oher said. Michael Vick surrounded himself around the wrong people and you have to be careful with that. He's redeemed himself. If you give someone a second chance, look at what happens. The guy came back and had an unbelievable season. That's all it takes just like the Tuohys gave me a second chance.
